divs: sighting detailsthis event happened on july 2000, around 23 pm. i was in the garden, playing with a friend. suddenly she exclaimed "look up! look up!" so i did: there was a triangular-shaped object above the house. in a blink it was above our heads: it was black with many yellow\red little lights and a big spinning sphere in the center. the nature of this sphere was very peculiar: it looked like a washer, there was an orange liquid washing around a yellow liquid. i ran to my house, i was really, really frightened, but my friend stayed there looking at the object. once at home i yelled "we must call the police and the journalists!" to my parents. after a while i calmed down. the next day i talked with my friend about it and she said that the object went away as soon as i ran screaming. it was a life-changing experience, and i still don't know what that object was.
Summary: Trangle hovers above me and a friend
trends: There have been no other sightings in Martellago
This sighting has never been favorited.
